query:
UPDATE mayor_info SET 
  name = 'Jörg Bierwirth',
  position = 'Bürgermeister',
  party = NULL,
  email = 'rathaus@schieder-schwalenberg.de',
  phone = '05282 / 601-0',
  photo = '/mayor.jpg',
  bio = 'Bürgermeister der Stadt Schieder-Schwalenberg'
WHERE id = 1;
